description: Double-wall insulated 32-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in calm yellow, and says "United" in quirky, almost cartoonish large lettering, followed by a small and formal-looking "BY BLUE" beneath.

Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in navy blue, and shows a map of random rough-edge islands, each with hints of brown and white over muted green.

Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in black, showing a myriad of stars, over a decorated crescent shining with thin colored lines and symbols.  The "UNITED BY BLUE" is beneath the crescent in cartoonish Wild-West lettering, underlined by a four-sided star with a little decorated shine of its own.

Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in yellowish milky white, and has a sparse steel-colored wood grain pattern on it.  The bottom of the pattern is framed by a black line, where "UNITED BY BLUE" fits in in tiny lettering.

Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in steel gray, and has on one side a stylized geometric figure of a bison with its leg halfway up, as if about to step on the name of the company in subdued lettering.  The bison is divided into random sections, each filled with a geometric pattern, in black, dark red, orange -- the same colors of the lines beneath the bison, as if underlining the large creature.

Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in calm deep green, and features a picture of a set of tall mountains, themselves beset by unimaginably-tall trees and in front of a large red disk of the Sun.  Beneath the mountains is a white framed line where the lettering of the company name resides.  Beneath that, halftone blue lines, remotely resembling outgoing waves on the surface of lake.

Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in steel blue, with waves in white, light blue, and greenish blue seemingly painted with a sparse brush.  White "UNITED BY BLUE" lettering fits in an empty spot near the bottom of the bottle, between the waves.

name.str: UbB 32oz water bottle, Change Comes in Waves

description: Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in black, with a print of painted greenish-blue waves foaming, and the yellow Sun above.  The waves say: "CHANGE COMES in WAVES".  The shore is implied by the red trees under the waves, with the company name in tiny red lettering hiding in the white foam.

Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in milky orange, with a print of random geometric waves, trees, leaves, and droplets, in deep blue, light blue, greenish-brown, and orange.  On one side there's "UNITED BY BLUE" in small blue lettering.  On the other, a promise: the company removes one pound of trash from oceans and waterways for every product purchased.  A blue diamond shape beneath the promise denotes the bottle's capacity: 32 oz.

Double-wall insulated 22-ounce water bottle by United by Blue.  Black plastic flat top opens halfway.  Has a small detachable cotton leash for carrying.  This one is in milky green, with two simplistically-drawn trees framing the Sun drawn in a similar fashion, and the company logo in red just underneath.
